attributes.action: Prohibit building on green belt land if there are empty residential properties.
attributes.background: Empty Dwelling Management Orders (EDMOs) allow councils to take over residential properties that are empty for 6 months or more. Figures published in 2018 show more than 216,000 homes had been empty for 6 months or more. Only 19 councils used an EDMO in the past 5 years and only 6 in the past year.
